data.name: Error_Plan_StartSessionRequired
data.value: Start time of the session is required.

data.name: Error_Plan_EndSessionRequired
data.value: End time of the session is required.

data.name: Error_Plan_TotalFeesMustBePositive
data.value: Total fees must be greater than zero.

data.name: Error_Plan_InvalidSessionTimeRange
data.value: Start time must be before end time.

data.name: Error_Plan_InvalidDateRange
data.value: Start date must be before end date.

data.name: Error_Plan_DaysOfWeekRequired
data.value: At least one day of the week must be selected.

data.name: Error_Plan_PlanTypeNotSupported
data.value: This plan type is not supported.

data.name: Error_Plan_PlanInactive
data.value: The plan is inactive and cannot be used.

data.name: Error_Plan_SessionTimeConflict
data.value: Another plan with the same session time exists on the selected days.

data.name: Error_Plan_PlanNotFound
data.value: The requested plan was not found.

data.name: Error_Plan_PlanCannotDeleteWithStudents
data.value: Cannot delete a plan that has registered students.

data.name: Error_Plan_PlanSaveFailure
data.value: Failed to save the plan. Please try again.

data.name: Error_Plan_ConstraintViolation
data.value: A database constraint was violated while processing the plan.
